items.name: Announcing larger instances for Amazon Lightsail

items.name: Expanding Stargate to Michigan
items.summary: OpenAI is expanding Stargate to Michigan with a new one-gigawatt campus that strengthens America’s AI infrastructure. The project will create jobs, drive investment, and support economic growth across the Midwest.

items.name: Introducing Aardvark: OpenAI’s agentic security researcher
items.summary: OpenAI introduces Aardvark, an AI-powered security researcher that autonomously finds, validates, and helps fix software vulnerabilities at scale. The system is in private beta—sign up to join early testing.

items.name: How we built OWL, the new architecture behind our ChatGPT-based browser, Atlas
items.summary: A deep dive into OWL, the new architecture powering ChatGPT Atlas—decoupling Chromium, enabling fast startup, rich UI, and agentic browsing with ChatGPT.

items.name: Split Cost Allocation Data for Amazon EKS supports Kubernetes labels

items.name: Members Page in Admin Settings of ChatGPT not loading
items.summary:
Status: Resolved

All impacted services have now fully recovered. Please try logging out and back in to access the members page again.

items.name: Increased API latency and error rates
items.summary:
Status: Resolved

From roughly 12pm PT until 1:30pm PT, customers may have experienced increased latency and error rates across various models, with gpt-4.1 and gpt-4o models most heavily impacted.

items.summary: Consensus uses GPT-5 and OpenAI’s Responses API to power a multi-agent research assistant that reads, analyzes, and synthesizes evidence in minutes—helping over 8 million researchers accelerate scientific discovery.
